alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 19 at 6:34AM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Pierce. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
